Package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.input

Annotation Interface ShesmuVariable

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(METHOD) public @interface ShesmuVariable
Annotation to indicate that a method in a value class is exported to the Shesmu compiler via InputFormat

The name of the method must be a valid Shesmu identifier

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    Gang[]
    gangs
    A set of gangs this variable should belong to
    boolean
    signable
    Whether the value should be included in the automatic signature generation
    TimeFormat
    timeFormat
    How times should be represented in JSON.
    String
    type
    A string containing the Imyhat type descriptor of the return type of the method

  • Element Details

    • signable

      boolean signable
      Whether the value should be included in the automatic signature generation
      Default:
      false

    • timeFormat

      TimeFormat timeFormat
      How times should be represented in JSON.
      Default:
      MILLIS_NUMERIC

    • type

      String type
      A string containing the Imyhat type descriptor of the return type of the method
      Default:
      ""

    • gangs

      Gang[] gangs
      A set of gangs this variable should belong to
      Default:
      {}
